roleset.name: kind

example.name: both args
example.text: He is kind to small children.

roleset.note: Updated by Julia based on BOLT-4,5.

example.name: arg0, ADV
example.text: She-1 eventually replied a couple of days later being *PRO*-1 unbelievably kind about it , which has really just made me fall even deeper -LRB- if this is possible -RRB- .
